Counselling & Psychotherapy Services

Find out a little bit more about how I can help

My services offer individuals the opportunity and space to understand life issues.

Speciality Areas.

Every patient has differing needs and aspects of their lives they are looking to work through. Here are some of the key areas I specialise in.

Depression & Anxiety

While we all feel sad, irritable or stressed from time to time, some people experience these feelings intensely or for sustained periods without apparent reason. Depression is more than just a mood, and anxiety is more than just feeling worried. I specialise in techniques to help people explore their feelings and take control.

Self-care & Well-being

Modern day life can cause us to invest less time and thought into our own lives and into ourselves. Therapy is not just for those suffering from mental health conditions, and can offer a safe and secure space to explore everyday issues, be more mindful, and to look closer at how to take care of our mental health.

Trauma & Healing

Life experiences can leave inedible marks on us, both as children and as adults. Our past selves shape our present and future selves. Delving into our past, although often painful, can help us work forward and heal from traumatic events that may be impacting our lives.

The Therapy Centre.

Located in the heart of Dublin City Centre, The Therapy Centre is within short walking distance of all major bus routes, the central Dart station and Luas stops.

The facility provides a warm and comfortable setting for people to talk through their concerns in a safe and private space.

FAQs.

Treatment Duration

Therapy sessions 50 minutes and are most beneficial on a weekly basis. The length of time an individual is in therapy depends on multiple factors. There is no set time as each person and concern is unique. This can be discussed with a Therapist during sessions or treatment.

Confidentiality

Confidentiality and privacy is a respected aspect of a Therapist's ethics. Your privacy is maintained to a professional extent during and after your treatment. In some serious and specific situations, Therapists may need to disclose information to protect the patient,

Online Therapy

Online therapy is the same practise as in-person, but held over an online platform such as Zoom. This can be a great service for those who are time-poor, living outside the area or those who wish to seek therapy in the comfort of their own home.

Fees & Cancellation

Fees are paid directly to the Therapist at the end of session by cash only. There are no debit/credit facilities available. The Therapy Centre employs a strick 48 hour cancellation policy. Appointments cancelled after this will be charged in full.
